summary:
EDUCATION:
PhD in Biology (1992)
MSc in Biology (1987)
Bachelors’ degree in Physics and Biology (1984)

POSITIONS, EMPLOYMENT:
2018-present: QA manager at Bdairy B.V.
2016-2018: Head 'Arla Food for Health'
2015-2016: Senior Lecturer The Hague University of Applied Sciences
2014-2015: Innovation Strategy Director at GLLI Consulting
2011-2013: CSM. Global Science Director Health & Wellness.
2009-2010: DSM Nutritional Products. Head Nutritional Science Europe & Asia-Pacific, Human Nutrition & Health. 
2007-2009: DSM Food Specialties. Global Head Nutritional Science, Functional Food Marketing.
2005-2007: DSM. Food Specialties. Head Nutritional Science, Functional Foods Business Unit.
2003-2005: Unilever. Brand Contact Manager Unilever Icecream Europe.
1999-2003: Unilever. Global Brand Contact Manager Bertolli.
1997-1999: Unilever. Innovation Project Leader Nutritional Science Laetta.
1995-1997: Unilever. Project Leader Antioxidants & Aging.
1992-1995: Netherlands Institute for Developmental Biology and University of Utrecht. Post-doctoral research.
1987-1992: University of Utrecht, The Netherlands. PhD Molecular Cell Biology.

Specialties: Innovation Management; Nutritional Science; Nutritional Optimization Product Portfolio; Stakeholder Management; Health Communications; Scientific and Regulatory Affairs; Nutrition & Health Marketing Strategy; Business partner.
